Detailed Description

Class that manages DzDevice objects.

Member Function Documentation

DzDevice DzDeviceMgr::getDevice ( Number  which  ) 

Parameters:
which The index of the device to get.
Returns:
A pointer to the device at the given index. The Device Manager owns this object - do not delete it.

int DzDeviceMgr::getNumDevices (  ) 

Returns:
The number of available devices.
